content: Take this path all the way down until you find an actual stone bridge, where a Thunder Rhino Master guards the way forward. Though he can cast a variety of lightning spells like the Rat Governors of Yellow Wind Ridge, they don't have a lot of health and aren't too much of a threat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
Take this path all the way down until you find an actual stone bridge, where a Thunder Rhino Master guards the way forward. Though he can cast a variety of lightning spells like the Rat Governors of Yellow Wind Ridge, they don't have a lot of health and aren't too much of a threat.
